name: Chase - First Person Experience
description:
Chase the criminal character and stop them from getting away! Your quick shooting is reflexes is the only thing standing in the way of his escape.

A very simple first person shooter game in the style of a runner. My first unreal 4 project too. Saying that expect it to be rough around the edges but still very playable. Very simple concept, shoot the npc running ahead of you a few times, avoid the red squares, and shoot the blue squares if you have to.

This is a final project for Columbia College Chicago's Game Production course. Any assets used were used for educational purposes only.
